ld R2 #5 		//R2 = 5
ld R3 #2		//R3 = 2
add R1 R2 R3	//R1 = 7
Sub R4 R1 R2	//R4 = 2 no stall

---------------------------------
001001_00010_00000_0000_0000_0000_0101		x24400005
001001_00011_00000_0000_0000_0000_0010		x24600002
100000_00001_00010_00011_0000_0000_000		x80221800
100010_00100_00001_00010_0000_0000_000		x88811000
